name: Cauliflower Fajita Salad with Sriracha Hummus Dressing
description: Another way to use the delicious Sheet Pan Cauliflower Fajita Vegetables; on a bed of salad with black beans, avocado slices and a super quick and delicious dressing made from storebought Sriracha hummus!
recipeIngredient: 2-3 heads romaine, washed and chopped small
(1) 15 ounce  can black beans, drained and rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Make the Sheet Pan Cauliflower Fajitas.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the Sheet Pan Cauliflower Fajitas.

recipeInstructions.text: Place 2-4 cups of chopped romaine on a large plate for as many people as you are serving. Place about 1-2 cups of the Cauliflower Fajita Vegetables on top of the lettuce. Sprinkle with 1/4 cup black beans and a few slices of avocado.
recipeInstructions.name: Place 2-4 cups of chopped romaine on a large plate for as many people as you are serving. Place about 1-2 cups of the Cauliflower Fajita Vegetables on top of the lettuce. Sprinkle with 1/4 cup black beans and a few slices of avocado.

recipeInstructions.text: For the dressing, add the Sriracha hummus to a medium bowl. Add 1/4 cup of water and whisk. Add a tablespoon of water at a time to reach the desired consistency. It should be creamy, not watery.
recipeInstructions.name: For the dressing, add the Sriracha hummus to a medium bowl. Add 1/4 cup of water and whisk. Add a tablespoon of water at a time to reach the desired consistency. It should be creamy, not watery.

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle on the dressing and serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Drizzle on the dressing and serve immediately.
